content:
Hi All

In Vocabulary WG's Friday Q3 quarter at the January 2022 WGM, it was decided that the work group will form a task force to develop new minimum requirements for a FHIR Terminology Server for inclusion in the core FHIR R5 specification. The task force will be led by Rob Hausam (CC'd) and I and meetings will be held weekly on Wednesdays 5:00PM EST.

As the meeting series for this task force in the HL7 Conference Call Centre was not created in time for a reminder notification email to be sent out for this week's meeting, please accept this message as a notification.

Date / Time:
Wed Feb 2, 2022 05:00PM EST
Wed Feb 2, 2022 10:00PM UTC
Thu Feb 3, 2022 08:00AM AEST
Please consult https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?iso=20220202T17&p1=784 for your local times.

Web Meeting Info
Join Zoom Meeting https://us02web.zoom.us/j/82144286417?pwd=TDJJdlNadEN6R05QcE9oc05WcmVuQT09 | Meeting ID: 821 4428 6417 | Passcode: 244832 | Note waiting room has been enabled, a host will have to let you in after you join.

Additional Info
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/VOC/R5+FHIR+Terminology+Server+Minimum+Requirements+Task+Force+Calls

Thank you
